meanings.definition: Afflicted with physical or mental distress
meanings.sent1: The pained expression on his face showed he was hurt.
meanings.sent2: She looked pained as she held her injured arm.
meanings.sent3: Despite his pained look, he tried to smile through the pain.
meanings.sent4: The pained cries of the injured animal echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The pained expression on her face was etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: Showing or expressing suffering or distress
meanings.sent1: Her pained eyes revealed the depth of her sorrow.
meanings.sent2: He gave a pained smile to hide his inner turmoil.
meanings.sent3: The pained expression on the clown's face made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The pained melody of the music touched the hearts of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The pained look in his eyes spoke volumes about his emotional state.
